Title: Pascale FUNG
Body: Pascale Fung and Dekai Wu: " Statistical Augmentation of a Chinese Machine-Readable Dictionary ", Second Annual Workshop on Very Large Corpora, Kyoto: Aug. 1994, 69-85 Pascale Fung and Kenneth Church: " K-vec: A New Approach for Aligning Parallel Texts ", COLING 94: 15th International Conference on Computational Linguistics, Kyoto: Aug 94, 1096-1102.
